channel.title: Making a chest with a list of items to pick [PI]
channel.description: Ok so i have been researching this for a while and this is extremely urgent as well. I have been looking for tutorials or snippets for this and it doesn't seem like there is something like this. Ok so what I'm, looking for is a single chest that has options to pick 4 different types of Armour. I've seen a tutorial on how to do this but it's with either one item or just random items with no options at all. So please help. I have a Project Insanity source BTW

item.title: Making a chest with a list of items to pick [PI]
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

erh i guess something like the mystery box in zombies but not exactly im adding a mini game in and need to add either a chest or stall =p and thank ublitz ill try it.

edit–
ok so i found some actions in the dialog handler and im not quite sure on making a npc have options that work, so if someone could post a solution i could embed it into an object instead of an npc. so please help. =’[ Btw heres an example of what im talking about

ex…

“case 72:
sendOption4(“Range”, “Melee”,“Magic”, “Prayer”);
c.dialogueAction = 100;
break;”

Read full topic
item.source: Making a chest with a list of items to pick [PI]

item.title: Making a chest with a list of items to pick [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

This might not be 100% acurate since i am on my ipod but it should be something like

in actionhandler you will have to add something like

Case OBJECTID
sendOptions(“arma, bandos, vesta, statius”)

don’t try copying and pasting this it won’t work. this is just an outline.then you should go into clicking buttons and try figuring it out

Read full topic

item.title: Making a chest with a list of items to pick [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

try finding the interface u want by doing ::interface (#) and look for the 1 want. then add it to the chest. then add to the items u want
hope this helped

Read full topic
